channel.title: Information Retrieval on Yuxin Fan
channel.description: Recent content in Information Retrieval on Yuxin Fan

item.title: Building a Production-Oriented Semantic Search System with Milvus and Cross-Encoder Reranking
item.description: A production-ready semantic search system that separates recall and precision through a multi-stage retrieval pipeline. Combines Milvus vector search, distance-based filtering, and Cross-Encoder reranking for high-quality retrieval results.
